tool_description: An API that retrieves live data from stock markets and currencies around the world
name: Live Stock and Forex Market Data
title: Live Stock and Forex Market Data
tool_name: Live Stock and Forex Market Data

api_list.name: Get individual stock or forex technical data
api_list.description:
Retrieve most current technical data for any stock or forex pair.
*All previous issued resolved*
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/symbols/EURUSD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get current Forex currencies data
api_list.description:
Retrieve most current forex currencies data.
select Forex pair type(example: major, minor, exotic, americas ect.)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/currencies/forex/major"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get current Stock market data
api_list.description:
Retrieve most current stock market data.
select country( example: usa, france, bahrain ect. ) and stock type(example: large capital stocks: large-cap, small capital stocks: small-cap, most active stocks: active
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/market/usa/large-cap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/market/{country}/{type}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-stock-and-forex-market-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
